Class RestService

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="srv")
public class RestService
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for all REST services exposed by the application.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        @RequestMapping(value="search",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String search(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String body)
        Service to be used as a proxy to retrieve results of the FTS search on a single table within the configured Postgres database.
        Parameters:
        body - - message to be used to create FTS search statement.
        Format Sample:
           {"table”:{
           "name”:"products”,
           "columns":[
               {"name”:”product_name”, "selectable”:true, "tsvectorinclude”:true },
               {"name”:”description”, "selectable”:false, "tsvectorinclude”:true},
               {"name”:”product_id”, "selectable”:true, "tsvectorinclude”:false}
           ],
           "query”:”i am looking for good product which uses GSM”,
           "configuration”:”english”
       }
        Returns:
        - result of the FTS search or error.
        Sample of the successfull response: 
            {"result":{
        "sqlstatement":"SELECT id, product_name FROM products WHERE to_tsvector('english',coalesce(description,'') || ' ' || co
    alesce(product_name,'')) @@ plainto_tsquery('need to connect')",
        "records":[{  "id":33,"product_name":"Genesys Connect for Service Cloud" }],
        "javatimemls":1560
    },
    "error":false
    }
        Sample of the failed request 
            {
    "error_message":"StatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [SELECT idb, product_name FROM products WHERE to_tsvec.....)]; nested exception is org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: column \"idb\" does not exist\n  Position: 8",
    "error":true
    }

      • createIndex

        @RequestMapping(value="index",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String createIndex(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String body)
        Service to create ts_vector index
        Parameters:
        body - JSON string with the instructions for index creation 
                     {"name":"idx_prddescr",
             "table":{
                     "name":"products",
                     "columns":[
                              {"name":"description"},
                              {"name":"product_name"}
                              ]}}
        Returns:
        Status for current operation

      • dropIndex

        @RequestMapping(value="index",
                method=DELETE,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String dropIndex(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String body)
        Service to drop an index
        Parameters:
        body - - JSON string with the name of index specified 
                     {"name":"idx_prddescr"}
        Returns:
        JSON string with the status of current operation
